Specializing in the Ketogenic Diet

An experimental dietary approach for the treatment of:

  • Cancer
  • Alzheimer's Disease
  • Autism
  • Lou Gehrig's Disease (ALS)
  • Parkinson's Disease
  • Migrane Headaches

Potter Dietitian Consulting, LLC provides a 3-month, medically monitored ketogenic diet program for eligible patients. The program is run by a Registered Dietitian (RD) with 27 years of experience in nutrition and 9 years experience with the Ketogenic Diet.

A high fat, low carbohydrate diet

The Ketogenic Diet (KD) is a high fat, moderate protein, low carbohydrate diet which is thought to starve cancer cells by depriving them of glucose. It may also enhance mitochondrial function, which plays a role in the treatment of ALS, Parkinson’s, and Alzheimer’s Diseases. The diet is very concise and is most effective with very high compliance.

Keto kit included

A “Keto Kit” will be provided to assist patients with all of the start-up equipment needed.
